items.title: This aluminum portable SSD is also a hub with SD/TF card reader, 100W PD port, more, and it starts from just $64 today
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find ORICO’s official storefront offering its new 1TB BookDrive Magnetic portable SSD for $119.99 shipped. This is a new model that hit the scene last week carrying a $150 price tag, and it’s now seeing its first deal as a launch offer at $30 off. You can also get this in 512GB and 2TB capacities, and they’re both down to their best prices today as well at $63.99 and $199.99 shipped, respectively. This particular drive doubles as an all-in-one hub with SD/TF card reader, 100W PD port, and more, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

Today’s deal takes things a step further, knocking $20 off the regular price and bringing it within just $1 of its all-time low from earlier this year. If you’re yet to give it a go, you can now land a year of 1Password Family for FREE to give it go – you can always manually cancel it before it auto renews on you if you’re not convinced it’s worth the price the following year. This deal is only for new users.

PLUS Malaysia Berhad, in collaboration with Yinson GreenTech, has announced the establishment of the country’s first-ever highway Integrated Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Hub. The hub is currently under construction at the Seremban Rest and Service Area (RSA) along the North–South Expressway. As part of this initiative, both companies have also formed a joint venture, Terra […]

The post PLUS, Yinson GreenTech To Build Malaysia’s First Highway Integrated EV Charging Hub appeared first on Lowyat.NET.

Reddit says it is expanding Reddit Answers, its Google Gemini-powered search experience, to five new languages: French, German, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese  —  Reddit announced Thursday that it is expanding its AI-powered search experience to five new languages: French, German, Spanish, Italian, and Portuguese.

Three labor unions filed a lawsuit in NY federal court to block the Trump administration from searching visa holders' social media for posts it deems hostile  —  The lawsuit filed Thursday is the latest of several challenges to the Trump administration's screening of visa holders' social media activity.

items.title: ANYCUBIC’s Photon Mono M7 Pro 14K resin 3D printer brings faster speeds + lower failure rates at a $456 low (Reg. $690)
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, ANYCUBIC is offering returning Prime Day rates on its Photon Mono M7 Pro 14K Resin 3D Printer for $455.99 shipped, which beats out the brand’s direct website pricing by $63. It’s dropping down from its $690 full price, with the discounts we’ve seen over this year having gone as low as $480 until last week’s Prime Day event, when it first fell to this rate. Now, it’s coming back around for a second chance score, cutting $234 off the tag for the best price we have tracked to date.

more…

items.title: Expand your Apple Home setup with three water leak sensors for $52 (Save 29%)
items.summary:
meross HomeKit Water Leak Sensors (3-pack)

Buy for $52 (Reg. $73)

What we love

Water can cause extensive damage in a home, so if there are some areas where you’d like to sprinkle some leak sensors, this deal has you covered. You’ll get three sensors in total, each of which pairs with the included HomeKit-ready hub so you can make your Apple Home even smarter.

items.title: Get 2-in-1 functionality with Greenworks’ 24V cordless pole saw and pole hedge trimmer at a $200 low (Reg. up to $300)
items.summary:
At Amazon, you can pick up a newer generation of the Greenworks 24V 10-inch Cordless Polesaw and Pole Hedge Trimmer Combo with 4.0Ah battery for $199.99 shipped, which matches in price directly from the brand’s website. It’s coming down from $261 here ($300 MSRP direct from the brand), with discounts through mid-June having taken things down to this same low rate before only dropping costs as low as $242 in the time since. The deal here gives you a $61 markdown that returns the price to the lowest we have tracked for the fourth time this year.
